ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 207
ygData.msgSnippet: I have never seen this happen at Najena in Lavastorm, soon as I see more than one FE jump in (or even one when I m level 12 or so), I hit that zone running and
ygData.messageBody:
I have never seen this happen at Najena in Lavastorm, soon as I see more
than one FE jump in (or even one when I'm level 12 or so), I hit that zone
running and screaming. Did have a similar thing happen to me leaving
Runnyeye for the Gorge one day, haven't explored that enough to even know
where I was, just memmed gate and cast. This happenned without being hit, I
think I bumped into someone on other side of zone and got transported. Had a
friend leave Permafrost one day (with a few Ice Goblns beating on him) and
get tossed up a hillside in Everfrost, then die from the fall. Took a bard
quite a bit of time to help him find his corpse.

Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
